original_text: From there Abraham journeyed toward the territory of the Negeb and lived between Kadesh and Shur; and he sojourned in Gerar.
korean_text: 아브라함이 거기서 네게브 땅으로 옮겨가 가데스와 술 사이 그랄에 거류하며

sentences.original_text: From there Abraham journeyed toward the territory of the Negeb
and lived between Kadesh and Shur
